Experience VP, SALES AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT - WIRELESS SERVICES ViaSat Inc. April 2013  – Present (2 years 5 months) Greater Dallas Area ViaSat's Wireless Services division (formerly NetNearU) -- has been an expert in public Wi-Fi network management for 17 years, and is one of the largest service providers of Wi-Fi in the world. Our seasoned team has developed deep industry knowledge and a best practice approach that ensures our customers’ long-term success.  
 
ViaSat currently serves more than 100,000+ in-building, outdoor and in-flight Wi-Fi networks, totaling more than 10 million APs, including military bases, office buildings, stadiums, hotels, hospitals, retail chains, restaurants, city-wide deployments, and everything in between. We are also an underlying service provider for telecom, mobile operator and cable service providers, commercial airlines, and other partners worldwide, including Comcast, Time Warner, Sprint, Cablevision, CableLabs, Level 3, American Tower, U.S Navy, Marines, Army, Air Force, Virgin America, Jet Blue, United Airlines and others. 
 
We provide flexible, comprehensive solutions for these customers so they can deliver their own unique branded experience any mobile device. Each unique and diverse experience has prepared our company to transform any complex Wi-Fi challenge into a simple and strategic solution. Our TRACKOS™ cloud-based management platform allows partners to easily customize portal pages, AAA, roaming, advertising, analytics and more. 
 
As a member of the leadership team, I help define our business units mission and direction. I also provide general oversight of our commercial revenue development, sales pipeline, product management and marketing activities. In addition, I serve as ViaSat's main executive representative to the Wireless Broadband Alliance (WBA), and am the Founder/Group Manager for the Wireless Internet Industry Executives (WIIE) group on LinkedIn.
